name: Search and place the order for the product

elements.name: Search Experience for the product search in both home and offer page

steps.name: user is on GreenCart Landing page
user searched with shortname Tomato and extract the actual name of the product
Add 3 items selected product to the cart
user proceeds to checkout Page and verify Tomato items in the checkout page
verify user have option to enter the promo code in checkout page
